Recipe.Name: Content
Recipe.Description: Sets up content types and content used on the Moov2 Website.
Recipe.Author: Moov2

CommonPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common information about a content item, such as Owner, Date Created, Date Published and Date Modified.

LayoutPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Adds a layout designer to your content type.

InvertedHeader.BooleanField.BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: Switch the header to white version.

TitlePart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides a Title for your content item.

section--gradient-light","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":1,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Heading","data":"Content=What+we+do&Level=3","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"text--impact","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Paragraph","data":"Content=%3cp+class%3d%22text--large%22%3eWe+recognise+the+best+game+experiences+are+supported+by+the+best+extended+experiences.+By+this+we+mean+the+use+of+mobile%2c+web+and+social+tools+to+compliment+and+enhance+player+acquisition+and+engagement.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22text--large%22%3eFrom+the+first+time+a+user+hears+about+your+game+right+through+to+their+100%25+completion+and+beyond.+We+focus+on+the+extended+experience+so+you+can+remain+focused+on+doing+what+you+do+best+-+making+world+class+games.%3c%2fp%3e","exportableData":"","index":1,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"align--vertical-middle section--padding-vertical","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":2,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Heading","data":"Content=Environment&Level=3","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"text--impact","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Paragraph","data":"Content=%3cp+class%3d%22text--large%22%3eMoov2+HQ+is+based+in+the+New+Forest+on+the+south+coast+of+the+UK.+We+have+woodland%2c+sea+and+roaming+ponies+on+our+doorstep.+Our+office+has+modern+necessities+such+as+widescreen+projector%2c+foosball+table%2c+3D+printer%2c+sofa+-+you+know+the+usual+stereotypical+agency+toys.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22text--large%22%3eWe+also+have+a+space+that+is+ideal+for+collaborative+development%2c+meetings+or+small+events.+If+you+would+like+to+use+this+space+then+please+don%27t+hesistate+to+%3ca+href%3d%22%2fcontact%22%3eget+in+touch%3c%2fa%3e.%3c%2fp%3e","exportableData":"","index":1,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"align--vertical-middle section--wide
